column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: year. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix yr: <http://example.org/year#> .# Class & subclassyr:Year a rdfs:Class .yr:LeapYear a rdfs:Class ;    rdfs:subClassOf yr:Year .# Propertiesyr:hasMonth a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain yr:Year ;    rdfs:range xsd:int .    yr:hasDay a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain yr:Year ;    rdfs:range xsd:int .    yr:inDecade a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain yr:Year ;    rdfs:range xsd:int .    yr:inCentury a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain yr:Year ;    rdfs:range xsd:int .    yr:isLeap a rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain yr:LeapYear ;    rdfs:range xsd:boolean .# Instancesyr:Year2000 a yr:LeapYear ;    yr:hasMonth 12 ;    yr:hasDay 366 ;    yr:inDecade 200 ;    yr:inCentury 20 ;    yr:isLeap true .
